entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Parrsboro
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parrsboro 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow or ice pellets beginning this morning then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain near noon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 4 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
